text: I felt this was much more than a Zelda clone. Crystalis had a much heavier focus on the RPG elements, which I enjoyed. I also thought the abilities were a lot more powerful and fun to use in this game. The towns, enemies and puzzles really captured my imagination as a kid.

text: This game is awesome. A zelda clone in which you could jump. The intro also says that the world ends in October 1997. I think I played it on that day. Rode the dolphin, jumped using the rabbit boots, and charged to 4th level with the thunder sword. Too bad lvl 16 was the max you could get.
